resources.string: Depression Application !! \n \n For All the FOREVER-ALONEs.

string-array.name: words
string-array.item: Forever Alone is your name, being Alone is your game
Life is tough ... you are not
You are far too sensitive ... baby skin personality
Life goes on ... you stay here

You’re strong, you will be fine 
 
 
 Just kidding, nobody likes you
You should phone me, but I am just an app :P
You should be better by now \n \n just kidding you will never be better
You will have to learn to live with it
تخيل \n \n أحلام عندها معجبين وأنت محد يحبك
محد يحبك .. بتقعد طول عمرك وحيد
